channel.title: [RELEASE]Prototype Racing Game Based On My Mitsubishi Model[RELEASE]
channel.description:
Alright, as I told some of you before I was working on a new project, well here it is. This is a prototype of a future project. Since I had finished the Mitsubishi, I though why not use it for this. I could use a 50k polygon car but I didn't since this is just a test. The model is made in 3DS Max, exported to FBX. Then imported in Unity wich is a really great engine that uses the DirectX 9 and OpenGL renderer. I worked all day on this game, the hard part was actully to set up the handling of the car. I tried to make it as realistic as possible and I have to say that I'm happy about the result. You can't feel the handling in the pictures ofcourse, that's why I'm also providing a download. That download includes this game, no setup needed. It's in a zip. Extract the contents in ONE folder and run the Mitsubishi Eclispe 1999 Simulator.exe. Tell me what you think and give some feedback. Oh btw, I setted up the racing track but I didn't model the trees, chairs,... myself.
DOWNLOAD: http://uppit.com/v/APN2ZIHF
[IMG]http://i290.photobucket.com/albums/ll242/VregScapeOwner/Untitled-22.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i290.photobucket.com/albums/ll242/VregScapeOwner/Untihhhhhhtled.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i290.photobucket.com/albums/ll242/VregScapeOwner/Untitttttttttttled.png[/img]

item.title: [RELEASE]Prototype Racing Game Based On My Mitsubishi Model[RELEASE]
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[quote=“MistaBigBoss, post:30, topic:329629”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=426009.msg3132315#msg3132315 date=1266611473]

Very nice, I would like to make a game like this myself one day. What program did you use? or was it just java script?

Lol’d.

JavaScript is a website language.
[/quote]Javascript is overall a language, it is most used for websites and its applications but you can also use it for anything else like a game engine oh and btw, IT WAS NOT A GAME, AND THE MODEL DIDN’T NEED TO BE GOOD because I was only TESTING the engine. If you spent some time reading the topic before posting, you would’ve known.[/quote]
I wasn’t the one that said it was a game.

[quote=“Frell, post:31, topic:329629”][quote author=Davidi2 link=topic=426009.msg3132315#msg3132315 date=1266611473]

Very nice, I would like to make a game like this myself one day. What program did you use? or was it just java script?

Lol’d.

JavaScript is a website language.
[/quote]
The scripts in Unity are in javascript.[/quote]
Orly? That’s rather odd… I only know the web JavaScript stuff.

item.title: [RELEASE]Prototype Racing Game Based On My Mitsubishi Model[RELEASE]
item.dc:creator: @MistaBigBoss MistaBigBoss
item.description:
@MistaBigBoss wrote:

[quote=“minoroin, post:26, topic:329629”]Very nice, I would like to make a game like this myself one day. What program did you use? or was it just java script?[/quote]err i can tell you, making this game was really hard, and I’m really good with computers, modeling and almost all other 3d graphics so thats means no good, i don’t think you will be ever capable to make sucha game, but how did i start? start with small things, model things, swords etc etc, then start modeling on a little higer level then higer and higer then start to learn animating, after u cn animate almost 100% start learning basic languages like javascript, etc and if you know enough you can throw al your knowledge together and make something like this

I used 3DS Max to model this its a 4000 dollar porgram but just go and crack it
and I used the unity engine to throw everything together.

Read full topic

item.title: [RELEASE]Prototype Racing Game Based On My Mitsubishi Model[RELEASE]
item.dc:creator: @MistaBigBoss MistaBigBoss
item.description:
@MistaBigBoss wrote:

[quote=“shrogg, post:22, topic:329629”]dude, i really want to be able to whip up small games like the one u have just made, but knowing my skills, it would take years :P[/quote]this game took me a day, because I had to give the car its instructions in javascript wich isnt my best language, it’s actully pretty simple to make such a game, first you need to model in 3ds max somthing, then you need to know what type of game your going to make, if your going to make a race game you wont need to animate because you need to make the wheels and the body 2 different objects, then you need to use an engine i used unity and you need to give the wheels the insructions to spin around its on axis and the longer you hold your forward button the faster it spins, I could make a tut on how to make a race game but I don’t think it would be something for mopar since mopar is far away from directx and opengl. if you want to make a 3rdperson shooter or whatverer you need to pre animate ur char with 3ds then you need to export all those animation with ur engine then you need to make a main script that controls those animations (speed, when they have to apply and etc.) actully theres ALOT more behind the scenes, I told the basic, you have gears and the mass of the car and much more…

Read full topic
